bike.description: A2-SL alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, hydroformed top tube, and semi-integrated tapered head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: A2-SL alloy w/ A-style seat stays and dropouts, cold forged dropout w/ CNC'D post disc mount and replaceable hanger
